text: "$pringfield (or, How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Legalized Gambling)" is the 10th episode of the 5th season of The Simpsons. It was first shown on television on December 16, 1993. In the episode, gambling becomes legal in Springfield. Mr. Burns starts a casino and gets Homer Simpson a job as a blackjack dealer. Marge gets a gambling addiction and Bart starts another casino in a treehouse. The episode was written by Bill Oakley and Josh Weinstein. Wes Archer is the director of the episode. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:1993 television episodes Category:The Simpsons (season 5) episodes
title: $pringfield (Or, How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Legalized Gambling)
